name: MSCRMPackSolution
description: Packages a CRM Solution using SolutionPackager.exe
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: Solution files must be checked-in to source control

inputs.name: unpackedFilesFolder
inputs.label: Unpacked Files Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder in source control containing the unpacked solution files extracted using SolutionPackager.exe

inputs.name: mappingFile
inputs.label: Mapping File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The mapping file in source control to be used by the SolutionPackager.exe when packing the solution

inputs.name: packageType
inputs.label: Package Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of solution package to create

inputs.name: updateVersion
inputs.label: Update Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the packaged solution version to the build number. build number format must end with '_x.x.x.x' e.g. '$(BuildDefinitionName)_5.0.0$(Rev:.r)'

inputs.name: includeVersionInSolutionFile
inputs.label: Include Version in Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to include the version number in the generated solution file name

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path on the agent machine where you want the solutions to be placed

inputs.name: treatPackWarningsAsErrors
inputs.label: Treat Warnings as Errors
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to fail the task if any warnings are encountered during the pack operation
